climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: EFFECTIVE IN CLEANING - Effectively help you clean the tank, water pipe and other parts of the toilet.
LONG-LASTING - Each toilet cleaner tablet lasts up to 15 Days (or 20 flushes daily), 12 tablets are for 6 months supply. BTW, each toilet tablet's lifetime may vary.

HOW TO USE - DO NOT tear off the blue outer protective film, which is soluble in water tank directly. Please leave the toilet tank cleaner in the water tank for at least 1 hours to dissolve sufficiently until water gets blue before flushing.

POINTS FOR ATTENTION - When the blue toilet bowl tablet dissolves completely, the blue will fade, a new toilet tank cleaner should be put into the tank. This product cannot completely replace the toilet brush. It is mainly to help maintain a clean toilet tank and reduce the dirt accumulation on the tank. Please clean the toilet tank with a toilet brush before the first-time use, so as to make a better use of this product.
CONVENIENT AND EASY TO USE - Vacplus toilet cleaner is convenient and easy to use. It will not cause any damage to the internal parts of the toilet tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so far it works great after a month :)
reviews.reviewText: a pleasant smell and nice color, last long for about a month, clean and straightforward iprocess.overal I am happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes, it works, but clean all mineral deposits above the water line before using.
reviews.reviewText: This works great on mineral deposits at the waterline. And once I cleaned these, they returned to some extent, but are very easy to clean.However, we had deposits along the vertical tracks of the water as it enters the bowl from the holes under the rim at the top after each flush. They were minimal and I hadn’t thought to clean them–big mistake.Unfortunately after using this product a few weeks, those deposits along the vertical tracks were stained blue. Worse those blue deposits were incredibly hard to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pros and Cons
reviews.reviewText: Decided to try these toilet pods to keep things fresh and blue in the bowl. Here's the scoop after giving them a go.Pros:- They do exactly what's promised—turn the toilet water a nice blue and leave a pleasant smell.- While they may not last an eternity, the quality during their effectiveness is top-notch.- Perfect for concealing stains, especially with well water. Some stubborn stains persist, but the blue water helps mask them.- Last longer than other brands I've tried, providing a decent duration of effectiveness.- Pleasant smell without an overpowering color, and they seem to last longer due to this balance.- Clear and straightforward instructions make placing the tablets in the tank a breeze, requiring a 30-60 minute wait for optimal results.Cons:- The longevity might not be the strongest suit, so if durability is a priority, exploring other options could be wise.- While they help maintain a reasonably clean bowl, they won't replace the occasional need for manual scrubbing.- Color release might be less vibrant with shorter intervals between flushes, but this seems to contribute to a longer-lasting effect.Additional Thoughts:Overall, a solid choice for toilet maintenance. I will definitely be ordering more of these. Hope this review helped!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick Ship & Fair Price!
reviews.reviewText: Just received my toilet tank/bowl cleaning tablets. Says to add one every two weeks or so. Looks like a quality product and hoping it does a great job! I love the blue color it adds to water and a nice scent as well! Thank again! Will buy more when I run out 🙏.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work well for me
reviews.reviewText: I followed the instructions to the letter and the water barely turned blue and then it didn't last long as well. This toilet isn't flushed a great deal as it's a second bathroom.. I personally wouldn't recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a good job
reviews.reviewText: I liked that this product helped with some of the smells that can be associated with a toilet. I felt like lasted quite a long time (1.5 weeks or so), and it ended up being a good purchase. My only qualm with it was that I placed one in the toilet jug and it messed up lever a bit, so our apartment maintenance staff fixed it. I wasn't sure if it was an issue with our toilet or the product, but either way it was an easy fix!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A decent option for maintaining freshness with bathroom for personal preference
reviews.reviewText: The Vacplus Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets provide convenience but have limitations. While they effectively clean and deodorize, the scent might be strong. The tablets last for a considerable period, yet results can vary based on water conditions. Each tablet last mainly for 2-3 weeks and can leave clumps at the end making the toilet bowl dirty but can be flushed to remove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Safe for septic tanks
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for a few months now. It seems to keep my toilet bowl fairly clean, but note it prevents stains it does not clean stains. I live by myself so the toilet doesn't get flushed super often I would say two or three times a day and one tablet will last me about 3 weeks to a month. Pretty crazy value for what you get. It has a very minor scent that you can only smell if you get super close to it, most of the time you won't even know it's there. The tablet inside the tank does slowly break apart and become a kind of sludgy material, so make of that what you will.Let me get to the real reason though why I'm writing this review at all because there's lots of other people recommending this product but nobody has been able to clear up whether it's safe for septic tanks or not. And the questions and answers section and in the review section there's people saying it's safe and there's people saying it's not safe. I have attached two photos of an insert card that you get inside of the box which details the ingredient list and is the only place I could find the ingredient list, note that the box itself does not say the ingredients only this insert card that's inside.The ingredients are as followed: sodium sulfate, sodium dodecylbenzenesulfonate, sodium hydrogen carbonate, carboxymethyl cellulose sodium, food blue no. 1, parfume, fatty acids, coco, lipase, triacylglycerol, subilisin, cellulase, amylaseApologies if any of these words are misspelled, I merely spelled them how they are on the insert card from the box. I googled each individual ingredient because I don't know anything about this sort of thing and I couldn't find anything saying any of these ingredients was bad for septic tanks.I don't claim to be the be-all end-all on this subject, but I wanted to put people's minds at ease who were worried about this particular topicAll in all a pretty great product that I will continue to purchase in the future and I highly recommend it. I took one star off because of the weird sludgy material that the tablet leaves behind in the tank. It also takes quite a bit of time to fully dissolve, I would say around 1 hour or more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Ladies, DO NOT waste your time on this stuff. looks nice when its in the loo (Loo Blue) but thats it ! no freshness smell, no clean toilet bowl, no nothing. In fact i think its adding to the pollution in our seas (its too late dudes as the plastic from the Nile and Far East has done the damage already) . So what to do? well, get the gloves and Bog-brush(Basil Brush) out give the Loo a scrub-a-Dub. happy hoildays

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t even bother with this product
reviews.reviewText: Lasts all of 3 days in. Used in two washrooms where the WC is used at an average of 6 times across both the washrooms. And now I have an additional worry about having to open up the tanks to check if they dissolved or are such bad quality that they are just sitting there !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I tried one In my toilet it was sat there didn't turn the water blue like it states it does, so I put one I'm the so I put toilet system done the same thing they don't work won't buy these again
Quantity is good but quality is bad,as it's written on pack 12 flush but it ends in 2-3 flush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Nice item and does what it is supposed to do.However, they do not last many flush at all. I will be searching for an alternative when I need more.
